name: Casale Santa Brigida: Art Monastery Guesthouse

reviews.text: I came down to Calvi, the Santa Brigida, and Art Monastery in early June, and really had a wonderful stay. The area is very peaceful and relaxing, and since it was very hot that week, the pool was wonderful! There are huge jasmine bushes and the air smells amazing, and a fig tree was full of delicious fruit. The hosts and landlord were very friendly and helpful in meeting my needs.
reviews.title: Amazing views of the Umbrian hills!

aka: Casale Santa Brigida: Art Monastery Guesthouse Umbria, Italy
description: Become a temporary part of our international arts community! The Art Monastery Project applies inspiring aspects of traditional monastic life (ecological sustainability, communal living, contemplative practice) to artmaking instead of religion. Whether or not you participate in group meditations, yoga on the pool deck, group meals, or tons of ongoing workshops, your stay at the Santa Brigida will be truly unique. €35/person/night for a double occupancy studio.
